text: Atumwi awo adati, “Chiyani! Kodi pangakhale chikayiko pa Mulungu, Namalenga wa kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi? Iye akukuitanani kuti akukhululukireni machimo anu ndi kukusungani mpaka pa nthawi yomwe idaikidwa.” Iwo adati, “Inu simuli ena, koma anthu ngati ife. Inu mufuna kutiletsa zimene makolo athu anali kupembedza. Tipatseni umboni weniweni wooneka.”
